Package uk.co.terminological.rjava.types

Class RNumericArray

java.lang.Object
uk.co.terminological.rjava.types.RArray<RNumeric>
uk.co.terminological.rjava.types.RNumericArray
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, JNIPrimitive, RObject
public class RNumericArray extends RArray<RNumeric> implements JNIPrimitive
The vector of numerics is needed to ensure that NA values are correctly handled and allow flexibility of a java List structure for easy manipulation. Factory methods are in RVector.
Version:
$Id: $Id
Author:
terminological
See Also:
